-- | High-level access to HTTPS Everywhere rulesets.
--   
@package https-everywhere-rules
@version 0.1.0

module Data.HTTPSEverywhere.Rules
rewriteURL :: URI -> IO URI
rewriteCookie :: URI -> Cookie -> IO Cookie
